entries.title: Samsung hints it is giving Galaxy Book the Galaxy S23 Ultra treatment

entries.title: There's a new top dog when it comes to dangerous malware
entries.description: Qbot takes over from Emotet as the number one malware worldwide.

entries.title: Microsoft releases fix for botched Windows Defender update, but it's still facing problems

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4090 and 4080 gaming laptops spotted with prices to make your wallet cower

entries.title: Hackers are using device monitoring software Cacti to install malware
entries.description: A known vulnerability in Cacti is being used to drop Mirai, with researchers spotting multiple attempts.

entries.title: McLaren harnesses AI to power real and virtual Formula 1 teams
entries.description: In a sport where quick data analysis and predictions are vital, McLaren tells us how AI can help with efficiency.

entries.title: Apple has made it harder to use Apple TV 4K without an iPhone, and it's a step back
entries.description: The Apple TV was always a great standalone product, but recent changes require an iPhone in places, and that's a shame for a product that's a hobbyist favorite outside of the Apple ecosystem.

entries.title: MSI Secure Boot goes haywire for a whole host of motherboards

entries.title: The Last of Us is already a huge hit – but it couldn't make HBO Max history

entries.title: Is sleeping on your side good for you?

entries.title: I'm going to turn on the feature that makes Dead Space run at 30 FPS on PS5
entries.description: The Dead Space remake will launch with two graphics modes on Xbox Series X and PS5, Quality and Performance.

entries.title: Netflix’s iPhone app just got much slicker, but still lacks crucial features

entries.title: My M1 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch is perfect - so I don't care about an M2 Pro upgrade
